text:
Exciting news! We are thrilled to announce a Gen AI hackathon combined with a workshop at our college! 🌟 

During this event, students will have the opportunity to learn how to create full-stack web applications using cutting-edge Generative AI technology. 🖥️✨ 

Following the workshop, participants will engage in a thrilling hackathon, where they will take what they've learned and put it into practice by developing their own web applications. The best project will earn a chance to attend the prestigious Mumbai Tech Fest! 🚀 

Join us in this amazing opportunity to innovate, learn, and showcase your talents. We can’t wait to see what you will create!
